Pazaak ——一个有趣的GUI卡牌游戏

帕扎卡（为了还原原文，下文直接用其英文名称）是一款为“星球大战:旧共♂和国武士”制作的纸牌游戏。它的玩法类似于21点，但是在Pazaak里，你的目标是不超过20分，或至少比你的对手更接近20分。注：这个游戏插件其实就是还原Pazaak这个卡牌游戏
原文：What is Pazaak?
[size=14.6667px]Pazaak is a card game created for the Star Wars Knights of The Old Republic videogame. It is very similar to Blackjack, but in this case, your objective is to reach 20 points without going over, or at least come closer to it than the opponent.
Pazaak原游戏图片：如果你不知道怎么玩Pazaak，你可以通过查看维基百科来了解：https://starwars.fandom.com/wiki/Pazaak/Legends不过别担心，我会在接下来“如何游玩”的部分继续介绍Pazaak的原文：
If you don't know how to play you can check the wiki:http://starwars.wikia.com/wiki/Pazaak/Legends
But don't worry, I'll resume the game in the How To Play section.

下文会提供汉化的配置文件下载。







游戏开始：
要开始游戏，你必须得输入这个指令来邀请另一个玩家跟你一起玩Pazaak：
/pazaak invite <玩家> <(可选) 下注金额>





只有另一个玩家也输入这个指令来接受邀请，你们才能开始游戏：
/pazaak accept
在游戏开始时，第一个回合会随机将一张牌放在任意玩家方。如图，有两边。左边的是我方，右边的是敌方。         原文：           To start a game you need to invite someone with this command:
[size=14.6667px]/pazaak invite <player> <(optional) bet>
The user must accept your invitation typing [size=14.6667px]/pazaak accept

[size=14.6667px]At the start of the game, the first turn will be determined randomly and a card will be placed on the player's side. As you can see, there are 2 sides. The left one is yours, and the right one is the opponent's.[/spoiler]游戏玩法：正如我之前所说，你的游戏目标是让你的点数达到20点。
如果你按了“结束此回合”按钮，就代表着你还需要一张牌，因此在下一轮开始时，一张牌将被随机添加到你的卡牌中。

如果你按了“STAND”按钮，就代表着你不需要再获得一张牌，所以直到回合结束，你的卡牌点数只会保持在当前的卡牌点数，并且在回合结束前无法使用其他卡牌。建议在17、18、19和20点使用此按钮。
(记住，如果你在点数为20分的时候使用了“STAND”按钮，不论对方下回合怎么行动
你都不会输，最多只会平局或者在下回合获得胜利（简单来说就是保底平局）
在你的回合开始时，一张新牌将被加到你的卡牌点数上。注：你最多只能有9张卡!
每个玩家都有4张额外的卡牌(随机选择)。这些额外的卡牌可以在你的回合时任意使用。其中有两种类型的额外卡片:-加号卡(+)
即加上一点点数-负卡(-)
即减去一点点数如果两玩家间有一个玩家赢了三个回合，那么此玩家胜利。
原文：[size=14.6667px]As I said before, the idea is to reach 20 points. If you use the "End Turn" button that means you need another card, so at the beginning of your next turn, a random card will be added to your points. 

[size=14.6667px]If you use the "Stand" button instead, that means that you don't need another card so you keep your current points until the end of the round and do not play any other cards. It is recomended to use this button at 17, 18, 19 and 20 points. (Remember, if you use STAND at 20 you can't lose, only win or draw)

[size=14.6667px]At the beginning of your turn, a new card will be added to your points. You can't have more than 9 cards!

[size=14.6667px]Finally, each of the player have 4 extra cards (chosed randomly) in their inventory. These cards can be played at any time you desire, but you need to be on your turn. There are two types of extra cards: 
[size=14.6667px]- Plus Cards (+)
[size=14.6667px]- Minus Cards (-)

[size=14.6667px]The player who wins 3 rounds wins the game.
